00004 EaglePlanJob* EaglePlanJob_New(EaglePlan *plan, int allocatedBuffers)
00005 {
00006     EaglePlanJob *job = (EaglePlanJob*) malloc(sizeof(EaglePlanJob));
00007     int i;
00008     
00009     job->plan = plan;
00010     
00011     /* initialize all buffers now */
00012     job->allocatedBuffers = allocatedBuffers;

00014     for(i = 0; i < job->allocatedBuffers; ++i) {

00021 void EaglePlanJob_Delete(EaglePlanJob *job)
00022 {

00024     
00025     if(!job) {
00026         return;
